about_the_game:
4 player co-op

Do you know what is better than robbing banks? Robbing banks with your friends!

Invite up to 3 friends to join you in your criminal endeavor!

Randomization

Robbing the same bank over and over again gets boring at some point. That's why many features like position of cameras, guards and objectives will be randomized for each playthrough.

This means every heist will feel a little different!

Stealth only

Sometimes not everything goes to plan - if you (or one of your accomplices) triggers the alarm you have to bail!

Once the cops arrive it's over. No shooting your way out.

Guards are only human

No real guard would patrol the whole night between point A and point B and point C...

Guards will get hungry, thristy or go to the toilet. And you can use that to your advantage!

short_description: Gather together with up to 3 friends and sneak into banks and shops to rob them. Avoid guards and cameras to steal some valuables. But be careful - once the cops show up it's over!
